name: Sajid Mohammad
topdescription: Full Stack Developer with 4+ years of experience building scalable web applications using the MEAN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, Angular, Node.js). Skilled in front-end and back-end development, including stored procedures and triggers in MSSQL and MySQL, delivering 30+ projects with a focus on performance, security, and user experience.

servicescontainer.s_des: Expert in building end-to-end web applications using MongoDB, MYSQL, MSSQL, Node.js, Express.js, NestJS, and Angular with seamless integration of front-end and back-end systems.
Expert in building end-to-end web applications using MongoDB, MYSQL, MSSQL, Node.js, Express.js, NestJS, and ReactJS with seamless integration of front-end and back-end systems.
Specialized in creating dynamic, responsive, and SEO-optimized front-end applications using Angular (v9–v19), TypeScript, RxJS, and Angular Material.
Proficient in developing secure REST APIs and server-side applications using Node.js, Express.js, and NestJS, integrated with MongoDB, MSSQL, and MySQL.
Experienced in designing and optimizing stored procedures and triggers in MSSQL and MySQL to enhance database performance and automate workflows.
Proficient in developing automation Cypress scripts to optimize processes and enhance efficiency.
Web designers craft the overall vision & plan for a website layout. Professional logo development: Business, Company, or Personal.
Creative graphic designer skilled in crafting visually appealing designs, including logos, banners, and social media creatives, using tools like Photoshop and Canva.

skills_container.skill_des: Expert in creating structured, semantic, and responsive web pages using HTML5, integrated with modern frameworks.
Proficient in styling responsive web interfaces with CSS3, including layouts, animations, and typography.
Skilled in using Bootstrap 5 for responsive, mobile-first web designs with prebuilt components.
Expert in building modern, user-friendly UI components with Angular Material, adhering to material design principles.
Experienced in integrating NG Bootstrap to enhance Angular applications with responsive components.
Proficient in JavaScript (ES6+), including DOM manipulation, asynchronous programming, and modern features.
Skilled in TypeScript for scalable, maintainable applications with strong typing and OOP concepts.
Experienced in modern JavaScript features (ES6–ES21), including modules, promises, and async/await.
Proficient in real-time communication using Socket.IO for chat apps and live updates.
Skilled in creating interactive charts for data visualization using Highcharts.
Experienced in building responsive charts for data visualization using Chart.js.
Proficient in simplifying DOM manipulation and dynamic content creation with jQuery.
Expert in building scalable web applications using Angular, leveraging RxJS, Ivy, and modular architecture.
Proficient in server-side rendering with Angular Universal for SEO and performance optimization.
Skilled in managing state in Angular applications using NGXS and NGRX for scalable solutions.
Experienced in building high-performance, event-driven server-side applications with Node.js.
Proficient in developing RESTful APIs with Express.js, integrating middleware for robust solutions.
Skilled in using NestJS for modular, scalable server-side applications with TypeScript.
Proficient in designing and managing NoSQL databases with MongoDB for scalable applications.
Skilled in designing and optimizing relational databases with MySQL, including stored procedures and triggers.
Experienced in managing MSSQL databases, with expertise in stored procedures and triggers for performance optimization.
Expert in writing and optimizing stored procedures in MSSQL and MySQL to enhance database performance and automate tasks.
Skilled in designing triggers in MSSQL and MySQL to automate workflows and ensure data integrity.
Proficient in securing REST APIs with JWT, OAuth2, rate limiting, and OWASP Top 10 practices.
Experienced in creating customizable .exe installers for Windows applications using Inno Setup.
Proficient in version control using Git and GitHub for branching, merging, and repository management.
Skilled in configuring Jenkins for CI/CD pipelines to automate development workflows.
Proficient in containerizing applications with Docker for consistent development and production environments.
Experienced in using Jira for agile project management and issue tracking.
Skilled in Agile and Scrum methodologies, driving efficient project delivery and collaboration.

resume_exp.des: Project is SE-TPTrac is a Third-Party Governance, Risk & Compliance Management platform. resume_exp.des: Led 25+ MEAN stack projects, integrating MongoDB and MySQL with stored procedures for efficient data operations. Developed Angular UIs and Node.js APIs, improving user experience by 70% and query performance by 80%.

resume_exp.des: Built hybrid mobile app backends with Node.js and MongoDB, and Angular front-ends with NGXS, enhancing UI responsiveness and security with JWT authentication.
